FuncDef: The reset dhcp client statistics command clears packet statistics on a DHCP client.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the type and number of an interface.
-

Specifies the name of an interface.
-

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
After the DHCP client function is enabled on a device, to view packet statistics about the DHCP client within a specified period, run the reset dhcp client statistics command to clear historical packet statistics and then run the display dhcp client statistics command.
